Listed below are the Third Party libraries that may be used in NoesisGUI software,
along with their licenses. NoesisGUI reserves the right to add, remove or modify
the list providing updated information to licensed users.

this permission notice or a reference to http://oss.sgi.com/projects/FreeB/
shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software.
